ingredients: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1/2 inch strips
instructions: Mix together brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, ginger, garlic and hot sauce in a small bowl.
Lightly salt and pepper the chicken strips.

Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken strips and brown on both sides, about 1 minute per side. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Simmer uncovered until the sauce thickens, 8 to 10 minutes.
title: Sweet, Sticky and Spicy Chicken
sentences: Mix together brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, ginger, garlic and hot sauce in a small bowl.
Lightly salt and pepper the chicken strips.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken strips and brown on both sides, about 1 minute per side.
Pour the sauce over the chicken.
Simmer uncovered until the sauce thickens, 8 to 10 minutes.
